integration.label: Payment interface
integration.helper: In order to enable in site payment interface, In Site module must be activated on your PayGreen back-office. What's more, your shop URL must be in HTTPS (SSL enabled): if not, your payment button will be disabled.

position.label: Button display order
position.helper: Choose your button order compared to your other PayGreen payment buttons. Use 0 to let your button order be defined automatically.

payment_number.label: Number of installments
payment_number.warning: Warning: the current legislation on payments in installments does not allow payments with more than 4 installments. Unless the product/service is delivered after payment.

first_payment_part.label: First installment's amount
first_payment_part.helper: Choose the percentage of the total amount to pay at the first installment. Let 0 to calculate first installment's amount automatically.

payment_report.label: Postponement of first installment
payment_report.helper: You can postpone first installment to allow your clients not pay it immediatly.

order_repeated.label: Renew previous order
order_repeated.helper: At each due payment, the previous order is recreated automatically.

errors.display_error: An error occurred while building button form.
